testcase.name: New User Registration
testcase.system-out: Given User is on registration page..........................................passed When user enters the personal details.......................................passed And User selects and accepts privacy policy.................................passed When User clicks on the continue button.....................................passed Then sucessful message displays as "Your Account Has Been Created!".........passed

testcase.name: Home Page Title
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the home page..............................................passed When user gets the title of the home page...................................passed Then title of the page should be "Register Account".........................passed

testcase.name: Home Page Header Bar count
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed When User gets the count of the header bar..................................passed Then Header count must be 8.................................................passed

testcase.name: Visibility of Home Page Headers Texts
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed When User gets the elements texts of headers................................passed Then texts of the headers should be.........................................passed

testcase.name: LoginPage Footers List
